QuestData.Title: I See Dead Arakkoa
QuestData.Description: I've got a strange problem and I'm hoping you might be able to help. I don't know who else could help, to be honest.$B$BMy workers keep saying they're seeing the ghost of the arakkoa that used to head up this place.$B$BI know, I know, it's crazy but could you take my Ghostogrifier 12000 to her body and check?$B$BIf there's a ghost around here, it'll find it. If there's not, then my workers are trying to slack off on the clock.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Ghostogrifier 12000 and kill the spirit of Talonpriest Zekk.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, I'll be. Ghosts. Who knew?
